Abstractor

Class CAbstraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Abstractor.CAbstraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAbstraction

    public class CAbstraction
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAbstraction
    A class that realizes a mapping from essential parse trees to abstract syntax trees.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CAbstraction()
      Creates a new CAbstraction

      CNode transformParseTree(CNode aParseTree)
      Transforms the assigned aParseTree object by replacing all occurrences of CMultiDotNode nodes by CTupleNode nodes, and returns an instance of the TransformedParseTree .

      • transformParseTree

        public CNode transformParseTree(CNode aParseTree)
        Transforms the assigned aParseTree object by replacing all occurrences of CMultiDotNode nodes by CTupleNode nodes, and returns an instance of the TransformedParseTree .
        Specified by:
        transformParseTree in interface IAbstraction
        Parameters:
        aParseTree - the CNode object to be transformed.
        Returns:
        an instance of CNode representing the TransformedParseTree .
        See Also:
        ECFGTreeTransformations.trMultiDotToTuple(GrammarNotions.ECFGNodes.CECFGNode)

      • abstr

        public CNode abstr(CECFGNode aNode)
        Returns the AST object corresponding to the given ParseTree object.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the CECFGNode object to be mapped to an AST.
        Returns:
        an instance of CNode representing the AST .

      • abstrEpsNode

        public CNode abstrEpsNode(CEpsNode aNode)
        Returns a null node. This method is intended to be used to prevent mapping of ParseTree nodes of type CEpsNode to AST nodes. There are no CEpsNode nodes in the abstract syntax.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the CEpsNode to be mapped.
        Returns:
        always returns null .

      • abstrTermNode

        public CNode abstrTermNode(CTermNode aNode)
        Returns a null node. This method is intended to be used to prevent mapping of ParseTree nodes of type CTermNode to AST nodes. There are no CTermNode nodes in the abstract syntax.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the CEpsNode to be mapped.
        Returns:
        always returns null .

      • abstrTermValueNode

        public CNode abstrTermValueNode(CTermValueNode aNode)
        Returns a null node. This method is intended to be used to prevent mapping of ParseTree nodes of type CTermValueNode to AST nodes. There are no CTermValueNode nodes in the abstract syntax.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the CEpsNode to be mapped.
        Returns:
        always returns null .

      • abstrNonTermNode

        public CNode abstrNonTermNode(CNonTermNode aNode)
        Returns an abstract syntax tree (ast) node corresponding to CNonTermNode object.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the CNonTermNode to be mapped to an abstract syntax tree (ast) node.
        Returns:
        the ast node corresponding to the CNonTermNode.

      • abstrOptionNode

        public CNode abstrOptionNode(COptionNode aNode)
        Returns ast node corresponding to COptionNode object. If aNode is an instance of COptionNode and is present then it will be mapped to its corresponding ast node.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the COptionNode to be mapped to an ast node.
        Returns:
        the ast node corresponding to the COptionNode.

      • abstrMultiDotNode

        public CNode abstrMultiDotNode(CMultiDotNode aNode)
        Returns a null node. This method is intended to be used to prevent mapping of ParseTree nodes of type CMultiDotNode to AST nodes. There are no CMultiDotNode nodes in the abstract syntax.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the CMultiDotNode to be mapped.
        Returns:
        always returns null .
